verbs.description: au gratin peas and potatoes while [ARG1: this delicious potato skillet] [V: is] [ARG2: a wonderful side dish] we find it satisfying enough to be a main course too the skillet preparation takes less time than it does to bake an au gratin casserole or scalloped potatoes- but it still good old - fashioned comfort food at its best —marie peterson deforest wisconsin
